column4: so i have a question, im trying to get my virtual box to run off of the windows partition i already have as shown in this guide here. http://blog.amhill.net/2010/01/27/linux-ftw-using-virtualbox-with-an-existing-windows-partition/  as i tell the terminal to create an mbr file in the virtual box folder with ~$ install-mbr â€“f ~/.VirtualBox/FAKE.mbr.... it returns..... Usage: install-mbr [options] <target> and ive tried playing
with wording but all for naught, im quite new at ubuntu but im not completely noob at computer, anyone wanna help
that could easily foul up your windows install. unless you configure windows to have multiple hardware profiles
try install-mbr --help and see what it says
